```{r}
data("mtcars")
library(s20x)
str(mtcars)

fit <- lm(mpg ~., mtcars)

summary(fit)
plot(fit)

bunch <- rnorm(150, mean = 0, sd = 5)
class(bunch)

library(tidyverse)
bunch %>% enframe(., name = "year", value = "numbers") %>% ts(., start = 1949, frequency = 12) %>% plot(.)

```
